Package com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb

Interface Summary
JiveForumService This interface defines contract to manage the Jive Forum.
JiveForumServiceLocal This EJB Local interface extends the JiveForumService interface, and it is marked with Local annotation to indicate it's an EJB Local interface.
JiveForumServiceRemote This EJB Remote interface extends the JiveForumService interface, and it is marked with Remote annotation to indicate it's an EJB Remote interface.
 

Exception Summary
ServiceConfigurationException This exception extends the BaseRuntimeException.
